channel.title: Quire & You
channel.description: Tips and thoughts to help you achieve your dreams and get things done.

item.title: Deprecating Support For Internet Explorer Browser Starting From 2021
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Today, we are sorry to say that Quire will no longer support Internet Explorer (IE) by December 31, 2020. This means, starting from 2021, if you’re using IE, you cannot load or view Quire’s workspace anymore.

item.title: 'Okay Google, talk to Quire!'
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Connect Quire with Google Assistant - the voice-controlled virtual assistant powered by Google. Manage your task list without having to open Quire app.

item.title: What is Agile Project Management and How Remote Teams Implement Agile With a Team Management Software
item.dc:creator: Josh Guilar
item.description: Agile project management is about being agile and adapting to what’s in front of you. For remote teams this is most effectively achieved by using team management software.

item.title: Achieve Stress-Free Productivity with Quire and Email Integrations
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Achieve highest productivity level with Quire! Turn your emails into tasks or get instant notifications in your mailbox with the click of a button and you will be set to focus on actually getting things done!

item.title: 10 Tips for How to Successfully Settle Into a New Job Post-Covid Job Loss
item.dc:creator: Josh Guilar
item.description: Here are 10 tips on how to settle into new work successfully after you’ve lost a job because of the pandemic.

item.title: Quire for Gmail: Turn Your Emails Into Tasks
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Break the loop of hell with the help from Gmail Add-on integration. Instantly create a task in Quire directly from your Google mailbox.

item.title: Brunch with Quire: Top 7 Quire Mobile Hacks to Make Your Life Easier
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: We hope your life has been easier with the help from Quire Mobile! If not (ooooopsss!), probably you have overlooked and missed some of these mobile hacks!

item.title: You're Not Lazy! You Just Don't Know How to Procrastinate Properly
item.dc:creator: Josh Guilar
item.description: While being lazy is unproductive and harmful to your work week, intentional procrastination can help you get more done consistently. Find out how!

item.title: 'Hey Siri, Add a Task in Quire!'
item.dc:creator: Vicky Pham
item.description: Your smart assistant Siri just got smarter with iOS 13 for you in Quire. Simply call up Siri and start a conversation now!

item.title: What is Team Management Software and Why Your Team Needs One Right Now
item.dc:creator: Josh Guilar
item.description: Team management software can significantly contribute to your business’ success by reducing risk, errors, and cost. Here are 8 examples.
